definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
stationery/item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)

sentences.english: The study used self-regulatory cycle to build the Self-regulated learning doctrine in WebQuest Learning system.
sentences.chinese: 开发具自律学习辅助机制之网路探究学习系统。

sentences.english: The surface of nectary with modified stoma was covered by a thin-cuticle layer with ripple sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 分泌表皮具波纹状角质层，表皮上分布有气孔器。

sentences.english: Able to work under pressure, working independently, willingness to work overtime or work with shift.
sentences.chinese: 具抗压性，能独立作业，并配合加班及轮班。

sentences.english: This passage is about the design of injection mould for the gland of ablution fluid bottle.
sentences.chinese: 本文是关于沐浴液瓶压盖注塑模具的设计。

sentences.english: They were carrying four or five at a time.
sentences.chinese: 他们一次要运出来四五具尸体。

sentences.english: Bud film contract and leaf long, lozenge or wedge, have notch shape a tooth-like part of anything.
sentences.chinese: 苞片约与花瓣等长，菱形或楔形，具缺刻状齿。

sentences.english: Sometime they can be pessimistic which is caused by their dualistic nature.
sentences.chinese: 由于具双重性格，有时候他们可能会悲观厌世。

sentences.english: Like the time he brought home the electric range.
sentences.chinese: 就像当初爸爸为家里买电热炉具的时候。

sentences.english: The development of the embryo sac is Polygonum type with numberous antipodal cells.
sentences.chinese: 胚囊的发育为蓼型，具多个反足细胞。

sentences.english: The vertical distribution of soil macrofauna had obvious surface assembly.
sentences.chinese: 垂直分布显示大型土壤动物具明显的表聚现象。

sentences.english: Abaxial surface of calyx with needle-like prickles.
sentences.chinese: 背面花萼具针叶象一样皮刺。

sentences.english: His team pulled 10 bodies out of Beichuan'shigh school Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日本救援队周日在北川中学挖掘出10具尸体。

sentences.english: International students with bachelor degrees are eligible to apply for master programs at NPIC.
sentences.chinese: 外国学生具学士学位者，得申请入学本校硕士班。

sentences.english: In general, the information from the blog posts is informative.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，博客内的内容是具教育性的。

sentences.english: Changes the nature ensiform leaf blade to be tall and slender. It has the obvious midrib.
sentences.chinese: 革质剑形叶片细长，具明显的中肋。

sentences.english: No deal with Israel will stick unless both Palestinian groups endorse it.
sentences.chinese: 与以方的任何协议，需巴方两党共同签署才具效力。

definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
classifier for coins, rings, badges, pearls, sporting medals, rockets, satellites etc/tree trunk/whip/wooden peg, used as a gag for marching soldiers (old)
